body: sign sign(tensor:~Tensor) -> ~Tensor Compute the sign of a tensor. This method can be used with Numpy data: n = np.array([-2, 7, -19])b = fe.backend.sign(n) # [-1, 1, -1] This method can be used with TensorFlow tensors: t = tf.constant([-2, 7, -19])b = fe.backend.sign(t) # [-1, 1, -1] This method can be used with PyTorch tensors: p = torch.tensor([-2, 7, -19])b = fe.backend.sign(p) # [-1, 1, -1] Args: tensor : The input value. Returns: The sign of each value of the `tensor`.Raises: ValueError : If tensor is an unacceptable data type.
title: sign
